attributes.action: Give emergency service workers free parking near their workplace
attributes.additional_details: We need to keep our emergency workers healthy during this crises and therefore must avoid them having to use public transport.
attributes.background: Police, fire fighters, all medical staff and other emergency workers should be able to park near their place of work notwithstanding council parking restrictions.

rejection.details:
The Government have announced that they will provide free car parking for all NHS and social care staff. You can read more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-to-provide-free-car-parking-for-nhs-and-social-care-staff.

More broadly, parking restrictions are the responsibility of local authorities or private providers, not the UK Government or Parliament. You may therefore wish to submit a petition to your local authority calling for them to take this course of action, as many have their own petitions systems.
